description: Dashboard for Kafka JMX metrics in a Kubernetes environment (KRaft-based)

targets.expr: kafka_server_brokertopicmetrics_total_bytesinpersec_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job="$job", pod=~"$pod"} / kafka_server_brokertopicmetrics_total_bytesoutpersec_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", job="$job", pod=~"$pod"}

panels.description: The average fraction of time the network processors are idle
panels.title: Idle network processors

panels.description: The average fraction of time the request handler threads are idle
panels.title: Idle request handler threads

title: Opstree/Kafka
